databricks-credentials.name: Databricks Credentials
databricks-credentials.description: Block used to manage Databricks authentication.
databricks-credentials.code_example:
Load stored Databricks credentials:
```python
from prefect_databricks import DatabricksCredentials
databricks_credentials_block = DatabricksCredentials.load("BLOCK_NAME")
```
